Uses of Class
math.Vec2

  • Packages that use Vec2 
    Package Description
    math
    Provides basic mathematical components for computer graphics: 2-, 3, 4- dimensional vectors, 3- and 4-dimensional matrices and Quaternions
    renderer
    Provides Render engines implementing the graphical interface.

    • Uses of Vec2 in math

      Methods in math that return Vec2 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Vec2 Vec2.abs()
      Discards the sign of each component.
      static Vec2 Vec2.abs​(Vec2 vec)
      Returns a new vector, with each component containing the absolute values
      Vec2 Vec2.add​(Vec2 right)  
      static Vec2 Vec2.add​(Vec2 left, Vec2 right)

      Clamps each component to the given min/max values.
      static Vec2 Vec2.clamp​(Vec2 vec, Vec2 min, Vec2 max)
      Returns a new vector, with each component clamped to the given min/max values.
      Vec2 Vec2.max​(Vec2 vec)
      Returns a vector containing the component-wise maxima

      v1 = [0, 5]
      v2 = [3, 0]

      v1.max( v2 ) = [3, 5]
      static Vec2 Vec2.max​(Vec2 left, Vec2 right)
      Returns a new vector containing the component-wise maxima
      v1 = [0, 5]
      v2 = [3, 0]

      max( v1, v2 ) = [3, 5]
      Vec2 Vec2.min​(Vec2 vec)

      v1 = [0, 5]
      v2 = [3, 0]

      v1.min( v2 ) = [0, 0]

      Linear, component-wise interpolation between the two vectors.

      result = [x1*x2, y1*y2]
